entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 4.0 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
